argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnfldms | |- CCfld e. MetSp |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( abs o. - ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_cncmet | |- ( abs o. - ) e. ( CMet ` CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnmet | |- ( abs o. - ) e. ( Met ` CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_metf | |- ( ( abs o. - ) e. ( Met ` CC ) -> ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR |
| 8 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR -> ( abs o. - ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fnresdm | |- ( ( abs o. - ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) -> ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( abs o. - ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_mp2b | |- ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( abs o. - ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cnfldds | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( dist ` CCfld ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_reseq1i | |- ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( ( dist ` CCfld ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( ( dist ` CCfld ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_iscms | |- ( CCfld e. CMetSp <-> ( CCfld e. MetSp /\ ( abs o. - ) e. ( CMet ` CC ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 3, 14 | #P_mpbir2an | |- CCfld e. CMetSp |
